item.title: -Delta- Need ::Giveadmin and ::Givemod
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

paste all this into your client.java under commands that are already there

if (command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(4);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM(“You have been made Moderator by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 1;
savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” Modarator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” Modarator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“owner”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” Co-Owner.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
if (command.startsWith(“hiden”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(6);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM(“You have been made hiden admin by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 4;
savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” Modarator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
else if(command.startsWith(“demote”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

You are welcome[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2009, 11:53:47 am[/size][hr]Here is one for donator

if (command.startsWith(“donator”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(4);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.sM(“You have been made Moderator by “+playerName+”. Log out to see changes.”);
c.playerRights = 7;
savegame(true);
c.disconnected = true;
sM(“You just made “+command.substring(4)+” Donator.”);
} catch(Exception e) {
sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
